thread.title_full: NHL Stanley Cup 2015-16: Hunt for the championship infographic - NHL - SI.com

title: NHL Stanley Cup 2015-16: Hunt for the championship infographic - NHL -
text:
by Allen Kim Twitter Email Posted: Wed Oct. 14, 2015 The 2015 NHL season is underway and the Blackhawks are trying to defend the championship they won by beating the Tampa Bay Lightning to take their sixth Stanley Cup, and third in the past six years, last spring. Chicago has opened as one of the favorites to win it again, ranking third in our preseason Power Rankings and fifth in our Week 1 edition .
While the Blackhawks are among the NHL’s 13 teams that have won multiple Cups, there are a dozen that still have yet to drink from Lord Stanley’s old punch bowl. Will one of them finally take home their first title next spring?
• Why your team won’t win the Stanley Cup
NHL Pain Is Coming: Mike Babcock goes from killing floor to Maple Leafs by Michael Farber
